name: V-Buck Collector
description:
In this awesome app, you can try your luck and win some V-Bucks. You will be able to withdraw them later.
This is not gamble, you don't have to deposit any money to start gaining V-Bucks, it's absolutely free!
This app is built on a very professional level by a game studio called Potion Games.
The font used in this app "Burbank Big" does not belong to our company, its free to download at Fontsempire.com
Latest patches:
 - problem with logging in
 - added more directions of V-Bucks
 - overall volume lowered down
 - added new font
